29 template <typename ALLOC = std::allocator<uint8_t>>
30 class BasicBitBuffer
31 {
32 public:
33  static_assert(std::is_same<uint8_t, typename ALLOC::value_type>::value,
34  "Allocator with uint8_t value_type is required!");

44  {

46  }

170 template <typename ALLOC>
171 BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>::BasicBitBuffer(const ALLOC& allocator) :
172  m_buffer(allocator), m_bitSize(0)

174 }

176 template <typename ALLOC>
177 BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>::BasicBitBuffer(size_t bitSize, const ALLOC& allocator) :
178  m_buffer((bitSize + 7) / 8, 0, allocator), m_bitSize(bitSize)
179 {
180 }

182 template <typename ALLOC>
183 BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>::BasicBitBuffer(const std::vector<uint8_t, ALLOC>& buffer) :
184  m_buffer(buffer), m_bitSize(8 * buffer.size())
185 {
186 }
187 
188 template <typename ALLOC>
189 BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>::BasicBitBuffer(const std::vector<uint8_t, ALLOC>& buffer, size_t bitSize) :
190  m_buffer(buffer.get_allocator()), m_bitSize(bitSize)
191 {
192  const size_t byteSize = (bitSize + 7) / 8;
193  if (buffer.size() < byteSize)
194  {
195  throw CppRuntimeException("BitBuffer: Bit size ") + bitSize +
196  " out of range for given vector byte size " + buffer.size() + "!";
197  }
198 
199  m_buffer.assign(buffer.data(), buffer.data() + byteSize);
200 }
201 
202 template <typename ALLOC>
203 BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>::BasicBitBuffer(std::vector<uint8_t, ALLOC>&& buffer) :
204  m_buffer(std::move(buffer)), m_bitSize(8 * m_buffer.size())
205 {
206 }
207 
208 template <typename ALLOC>
209 BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>::BasicBitBuffer(std::vector<uint8_t, ALLOC>&& buffer, size_t bitSize) :
210  m_buffer(std::move(buffer)), m_bitSize(bitSize)
211 {
212  const size_t byteSize = (bitSize + 7) / 8;
213  if (m_buffer.size() < byteSize)
214  {
215  throw CppRuntimeException("BitBuffer: Bit size ") + bitSize +
216  " out of range for given vector byte size " + buffer.size() + "!";
217  }
218 }
219 
220 template <typename ALLOC>
221 BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>::BasicBitBuffer(const uint8_t* buffer, size_t bitSize, const ALLOC& allocator) :
222  m_buffer(buffer, buffer + (bitSize + 7) / 8, allocator), m_bitSize(bitSize)
223 {
224 }

227 inline BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>::BasicBitBuffer(const BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>& other, const ALLOC& allocator) :
228  m_buffer(other.m_buffer, allocator), m_bitSize(other.m_bitSize)
229 {
230 }

232 template<typename ALLOC>
233 inline BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>::BasicBitBuffer(const BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>&& other, const ALLOC& allocator) :
234  m_buffer(std::move(other.m_buffer), allocator), m_bitSize(other.m_bitSize)
235 {
236 }

238 template <typename ALLOC>
239 bool BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>::operator==(const BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>& other) const
240 {
241  if (this != &other)
242  {
243  if (m_bitSize != other.m_bitSize)
244  return false;
245 
246  const size_t byteSize = getByteSize();
247  if (byteSize > 0)
248  {
249  if (byteSize > 1)
250  {
251  if (memcmp(getBuffer(), other.getBuffer(), byteSize - 1) != 0)
252  return false;
253  }
254 
255  if (getMaskedLastByte() != other.getMaskedLastByte())
256  return false;
257  }
258  }
259 
260  return true;
261 }
262 
263 template <typename ALLOC>
264 uint32_t BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>::hashCode() const
265 {
266  uint32_t result = ::zserio::HASH_SEED;
267  const size_t byteSize = getByteSize();
268  if (byteSize > 0)
269  {
270  if (byteSize > 1)
271  {
272  const uint8_t* lastElement = getBuffer() + byteSize - 1;
273  for (const uint8_t* p = getBuffer(); p < lastElement; p++)
274  result = calcHashCode(result, *p);
275  }
276  result = ::zserio::calcHashCode(result, getMaskedLastByte());
277  }
278 
279  return result;
280 }
281 
282 template <typename ALLOC>
283 const uint8_t* BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>::getBuffer() const
284 {
285  return m_buffer.data();
286 }

288 template <typename ALLOC>
289 uint8_t* BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>::getBuffer()
290 {
291  return m_buffer.data();
292 }
293 
294 template <typename ALLOC>
295 size_t BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>::getBitSize() const
296 {
297  return m_bitSize;
298 }
299 
300 template <typename ALLOC>
301 size_t BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>::getByteSize() const
302 {
303  return (m_bitSize + 7) / 8;
304 }
305 
306 template <typename ALLOC>
307 uint8_t BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>::getMaskedLastByte() const
308 {
309  const size_t roundedByteSize = m_bitSize / 8;
310  const uint8_t lastByteBits = static_cast<uint8_t>(m_bitSize - 8 * roundedByteSize);
311 
312  return (lastByteBits == 0) ? m_buffer[roundedByteSize - 1] :
313  (m_buffer[roundedByteSize] & (0xFF << (8 - lastByteBits)));
314 }
